snippet: A federal appeals court on Tuesday struck down a ban on carrying concealed weapons in Illinois, the only remaining state where carrying concealed weapons is entirely illegal.
abstract: Federal appeals court strikes down ban on carrying concealed weapons in Illinois, only remaining state where carrying concealed weapons is entirely illegal; decision is major victory for gun rights advocates.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Tuesday struck down a ban on carrying concealed weapons in Illinois, the only remaining state where carrying concealed weapons is entirely illegal.

headline.seo: Illinois Appeals Court Overturns State Ban on Concealed Weapons
headline.main: Illinois: Appeals Court Overturns State Ban on Concealed Weapons
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Appeals Court Overturns State Ban On Concealed Weapons
